text: Praktica was the brand name for a number of cameras, that were built by the state-owned company Kamera-Werke Niedersedlitz, and its predecessors. Between 1949 and 2001, about 9 mililon cameras were made.VEB Pentacon Dresden , Deutsches Technikmuseum Berlin, 2008 With the German reunification, the company was dissolved. The brand name was given to Carl Zeiss AG == References == Category:Companies of Germany
title: Praktica
